name: Shuttle Central
headline: Helping travel companies to sell transportation online
description: API for Travel companies to sell airport transportation. Helping them increase their profits by up to 20% per transaction

founders.name: Barsi Luna, Founder
founders.description: Self started and passionate about operations optimization. With 13+ years of experience in the Travel Industry and previous travel companies created.

founders.name: Jorge De Cordova, Founder
founders.description:
32 Year old, Mexican, Married to an amazing woman and father of a 9Month old baby.
Started my college degree in advertising and communications, started working in tourism to assist my parent with college fees, and fell in-love with the travel work (I met Barsi in my very first job)
10 years in we Founded Shuttle Central and now, HERE WE ARE! :)

generated_description:
**Shuttle Central: Your Go-To for Online Transportation Solutions**

Founded in 2019 and a proud member of Y Combinator's W22 batch, Shuttle Central is all about empowering travel companies to sell transportation online. Based in the beautiful Cancún, Mexico, this startup has quickly carved its niche in the travel tech space with a mission that resonates: to help travel companies boost their profits—by as much as 20% for each transaction through their platform.

At its core, Shuttle Central started as an API designed specifically for travel firms aiming to streamline airport transportation bookings. Now, with a growing team of 28 dedicated employees, the company has expanded its offerings, driving significant enhancements in customer experience. 

Their service includes seamless airport transportation, point-to-point logistics, and even car rentals, all designed to cater to the evolving needs of travelers. With over 500,000 happy travelers under their belt, they pride themselves on real-time flight tracking, easy booking management, and a commitment to safety with highly qualified drivers and sanitized vehicles.

Shuttle Central is tagged under categories like B2B, travel, e-commerce, transportation, and mobility, setting it firmly in the landscape of modern travel solutions. Whether you’re planning a simple airport transfer or a round trip, they’ve got you covered with their user-friendly platform.

If you want to check them out, their website is [Shuttle Central](https://book.shuttlecentral.com). You can reach them directly at +1 786 723 6220 or via email at ebookings@shuttlecentral.com.

In a nutshell, Shuttle Central is reshaping how travel companies operate in the transportation space, making it easier for them to increase their online service offerings while ensuring that travelers have a smooth, reliable experience.
